text:
Peter Pellegrini (born 6 October 1975) is a Slovak politician. He was the Prime Minister of Slovakia from 22 March 2018 to 21 March 2020.
Between 2006 and 2012 he was a member of the National Council of Slovakia. He then became State Secretary for Finance until his appointment as Minister for Education, Science, Research and Sport on 3 July 2014. He was Speaker of the National Council between 25 November 2014 and 23 March 2016.
